title: vAna inbamum peridO
sahitya:
vAna inbam peridO dEsha bhaktiyilum inidO


caraNam 1    dIna janangaL varuttam kaNDu sheidu pAr avarkku toNDu
 dEivamarugum magizhvu koNDu janmam eDutta payanum uNDu
  caraNam 2    veLLakkoDumai nOigaL varumai vETrarashin kIzh vAzhum shirumai
 koLLayaraiyum vaNangum maDamai kuzhandai shirikka marandOm kaDamai
  caraNam 3    EzhaigaL azhum pozhudu shAntam engirundu varum vEdAntam
 kOzhaittanam durguNam madAntam kuzhavi nATTaik-kollum mAntam
